content:
/>
VIII.iv.3.C.5.c
.
Development for VA Form 21-8940 During a Supplemental IU Claim
Develop for
VA Form 21-8940
during a supplemental claim when
it has not been previously submitted
the only
VA Form(s) 21-8940
of record was submitted with a finally adjudicated claim, or
when the evidence of record indicates a material change in the Veteran’s employment history has occurred since the last-submitted
VA Form 21-8940
.
References
:  For more information on
development for
VA Form 21-8940
during an initial claim, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.B.1.c
, and
the definition of a finally adjudicated claim, see
38 CFR 3.160
, and
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 1.A.1.c
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
